actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates the specified lands as wilderness areas for inclusion in the National Wildlife Refuge System. Designates the specified lands as wilderness areas within the National Park system. Designates the specified lands as wilderness areas within the National Forest System.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.
